attributes.action: aid English and Welsh business/industry by giving independence to Scotland depending on the results of referendums from Scotland or England/Wales.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Scottish independence would lead to more orders coming to business and industry in England and Wales as an increased number of orders would go to both countries. It could allow a reduction in business taxation whilst possibly even allowing a rise in government expenditure. An increase in the rate of taxation on spirits could also raise a degree of revenue. It would aid both heavy industry such as shipyards and hitech industry such as the aerospace industry.
